housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.ingest_data module

A script to download and create training and validation datasets. Different input arguments this script will take are-

  1. folder where data(raw and processed will be stored)

  2. Arguments for logging

housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.ingest_data.load_housing_data(housing_path)
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.ingest_data.pre_process_data(df, imputer=None)

housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.score module

This script is used to score the model(s) we have trained in train.py file. Input Arguments taken by this script are- 1) Folder where models are stored. 2) Folder where test dataset is stored. 3) Folder where output will be stored.

housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.score.X_y_creation(df)
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.score.load_dataset(path)
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.score.model_scoring(models_list)
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.score.models_list(model_folder)

housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.train module

This script is used for training the model(s). Input Arguments for this script are-

  1. Folder Path where train dataset is stored.

  2. Folder Path where model will be saved

housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.train.X_y_creation(df)
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.train.create_and_save_DTR_model()
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.train.create_and_save_LR_model()
housing_price_harsh_raghuwanshi.train.create_and_save_RFR_model()
